sentence: He described his family as being conservative and claimed that his brother helped him get into “right-wing literature.” Right-wing extremism is absolutely a family affair for Krvaric, whose brother Oliver is the leader of the San Diego State University College Republicans, has made appearances on Tucker Carlson, spews racist talking points, and considers Carlson and GOP insurrection sympathizers like Paul Gosar and Josh Hawley to be “thought leaders.” The siblings’ father, Tony, is the former chairman of the San Diego County GOP and even had his own neo-Nazi scandal.
title: Marine reservist under investigation for alleged extremist ties comes from family of Republicans

sentence: Extremists like Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) are enabled by craven politicians like House GOP leader McCarthy, a man so scared of his own voters he can’t be found for comment when his caucus members appear alongside white supremacists.
author: Thomas Kennedy
title: COMPLICITY: Kevin McCarthy silent when Marjorie Taylor Greene speaks at white supremacist conference

sentence: “As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling.
author: John Bowden
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene defends speaking at white supremacist event saying she didn’t know what it was

sentence: McCarthy, R-Calif., said he plans to speak with the Georgia Republican and Rep. Paul Gosar, who spoke at the event last year and appeared this year in a 30-second pre-recorded video.
author: Morgan Phillips
title: 'Appalling and wrong': Mitch McConnell and Kevin McCarthy slam Marjorie Taylor Greene for appearing alongside white supremacist

sentence: The petition, from a group called Faithful America, is addressed to “RNC Chair Ronna McDaniel” and says “As grassroots Christians from across the country, we call on the RNC to censure Representatives Marjorie Taylor Green and Paul Gosar for taking part in the explicitly white nationalist America First Political Action Conference.” McDaniel did issue a statement over the weekend condemning “white supremacy, neo-Nazism, hate speech and bigotry are disgusting and do not have a home in the Republican Party.” Both Greene and Gosar have been roundly condemned for addressing the conference hosted by white nationalist and Holocaust-denier Nick Fuentes.
author: Alex Griffing
title: Nearly 13,000 Christians Sign Petition Calling on the RNC to Censure Reps. Greene and Gosar For Addressing White Nationalist Group

sentence: Prescott Republican Congressman Paul Gosar was listed as a “special guest” with the white nationalist American Populist Union at an event that will be on a date popular among white nationalists and Neo-Nazis: Hitler’s birthday.
author: Ed Scarce
title: Paul Gosar Is GOP's Designated White Nationalist
